emuInput.TitMainTitle: Members of Alpha Sigma Chapter of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, seated from left: Barbara Pollard, Amelia Dobbs, and Barbara Alston Clark; standing: June Gibson, Patricia Yancey, Patricia Prattis (Jennings), Jewel Clark Taylor, and Linda Pollard, posed for youth fashion show at Carnegie Carnegie Institute of Technology
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 2, 1962, page 17, reads: "'Suited' for Spring - Beaming with pride because of the success of their recent Youth Fashion Show, members of the Alpha Sigma Chapter of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority are pictured here in the smart spring suits they wore in the show. The event was held in the new student activities center at the Carnegie Tech and was the first venture of this type for the Alpha Sigma Chapter. Seated (left to right): Barbara Pollard, basileus; Mrs. Amelia Dobbs, Alpha Alpha Omega soror who served as commentator, and Barbara Alston. Second row: June Gibson, Patricia Yancey, Patricia Prattis, Jewel Clark and Linda Pollard. - Harris Photo"
